dcterms:creator: I. Anina
Z. Zhou
G. Zhao
M. Pietikinen
dcterms:description: The OuluVS2 dataset contains 52 speakers saying 10 utterances, 3 times each, resulting in a total of 156 examples per utterance. The mouth ROIs are provided and downscaled to maintain the aspect ratio.
dcterms:title: OuluVS2

dcterms:creator: E. Patterson
S. Gurbuz
Z. Tufekci
J. Gowdy
dcterms:description: The CUAVE dataset contains 36 subjects speaking digits 0 to 9, 5 times each, resulting in a total of 180 examples per digit. The dataset includes tracked facial points and mouth ROIs extracted from aligned faces.
dcterms:title: CUAVE
